step_explanation: The first wrong step is step 5. Step 5 adds information not included in the question statement <Because there is also a door of 20 square feet on the second wall>, causing the result of step 5 to be overestimated by 20. Step 7, as the subsequent step of step 5, miscalculates 640 sq. ft. - 100 sq. ft. = 540 sq. ft. instead of 640 sq. ft. - 80 sq. ft. = 560 sq. ft. The first step to make a mistake, which is the root cause of the mistake, is step 5, so pred_wrong_step is 5.

The first wrong step is step 5. Step 5 adds information not included in the question statement <Because there is also a window of 30 square feet on the second wall>, causing the result of step 5 to be overestimated by 30. Step 7, as the subsequent step of step 5, miscalculates 640 sq. ft. - 110 sq. ft. = 530 sq. ft. instead of 640 sq. ft. - 80 sq. ft. = 560 sq. ft. The first step to make a mistake, which is the root cause of the mistake, is step 5, so pred_wrong_step is 5.
